title: Transformation of Data on a Scatterplot
question_text:
A statistician plotted bivariate data and constructed a residual plot on the original data, as shown below.
What transformations should be performed on the data in order for a least-squares regression line to be an appropriate model?

choices.text: Take the log of the y-values.
Take the log of the x-values.
Take the log of the x- and y-values.
Take the natural log of the y-values (ln).
